nodes.title: Fix crash on remote clien by initializing the CelestialSystem on remote clients too.
Added some javadoc
Round one of Gradle / Artifactory / Jenkins overhaul
Increase world timer tick frequency
Update FPS display only twice per second
Fixed issue with border determination - #1358
Fixing TreeProvider to extend the borders of BiomeFacet, as it is needed...
Introducing periodic scheduled actions to DelayManager
Adding permissions to Terasology.
Update versioneye plugin to 1.0.0 (requires Gradle 2.1)
Reimplement the purgeWorld command on top of the new auto save system.
Quick fix junit test that broke with #1366
Toggle running
Added sparse implementations for 3D facets (and unit tests)
Make player system facet agnostic
Chunk update occlusion detection
Fix NPE in DebugOverlay.
Fix checkstyle errors and related warnings
Fix an issue where the FPS counter stops updating and make it update per each draw again.
Make the isChunkValidForRender check a lot faster.
Add linux protobuf compiler and make the grandlew task runProtobufLinux working
Fix storage manager tests and the loading of uncompressed chunks

Fixing NPE in DelayedActionSystem.
Fix Rect2i.encompasses()
Small set of changes salvaged from PR #1108.
Fix NetworkOwnershipTest unit tests
PC Facade Improvements: Javadoc, launch args and usage requests.

Use headless env. for testing

Properly deactivate entites when their chunks get unloaded.

For discussion: Init systems fix

Make it possible to attack and interact with characters.

cell remove fix
